cycle1.title: Cycle 1
cycle1.content:
Cycle 1: Accelerate
Cycle 1 (Accelerate) jump-starts your weight loss, improves your digestion and boosts your metabolism. During this 17-day phase, you can expect to lose between 10 to 15 pounds by eating only from the Accelerate food list.
Accelerate guidelines:
  • Unlimited amounts of specific lean proteins and cleansing vegetables
  • 2 servings of low-sugar fruits
  • 2 servings of probiotic foods
  • 1 to 2 tablespoons of friendly fats
